messages.subject: Re: one review (instructional materials of the 21st century)
messages.msgSnippet: The description of The Deluxe Transitive Vampire reminded me of a game my son and I saw at a software store the other day. It was called Typing of the Dead and
messages.messageBody:
The description of The Deluxe Transitive Vampire reminded me of a game my son and I saw at a software store the other day.

It was called Typing of the Dead and seemed to be a typing instruction programme wrapped up as a zombie zapping game. Players destroy the zombies by typing quickly and accurately.

I don't know if it's any good, but it struck my fancy. Really silly and probably fun to develop.

Joan
